explains: n. 扭打；（行动、声音）匆忙
v. 扭打；匆忙慌乱地走

sentences.en: He was involved in a scuffle with a photographer.
sentences.cn: 他和一名摄影记者发生了肢体冲撞。

sentences.en: What began as a minor scuffle turned into a full-scale riot.
sentences.cn: 开始的小冲突演变成了大规模的暴乱。

sentences.en: It keeps 'em so busy they fair scuffle to get 'em done.
sentences.cn: 它们太忙了，只能草草了事。
